name: Diluc
description: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

combatTalents.title: Tempered Sword
combatTalents.description:
Normal Attack
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

Charged Attack
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At the end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

combatTalents.title: Searing Onslaught
combatTalents.description:
Performs a forward slash that deals Pyro DMG.
This skill can be consecutively used 3 times. Enters CD if not cast again within a short period.
combatTalents.excerpt: The slashes represent the values that Diluc holds dear: one for justice, one for courage, and one for duty.

combatTalents.title: Dawn
combatTalents.description:
Releases intense flames to knock nearby enemies back, dealing Pyro DMG. The flames then converge into the weapon, summoning a Phoenix that flies forward and deals massive Pyro DMG to all enemies in its path. The Phoenix explodes upon reaching its destination, causing a large amount of AoE Pyro DMG.
The searing flames that run down his blade cause it to be infused with Pyro.
combatTalents.excerpt: The only reason to walk in the darkness is to light it up. Behold, that fleeing light in the dead of night is the herald of the coming dawn.

passiveTalents.title: Relentless
passiveTalents.description: Diluc's Charged Attack Stamina Cost is decreased by 50%, and its duration is increased by 3s.

passiveTalents.title: Blessing of Phoenix
passiveTalents.description: The Pyro Infusion provided by Dawn lasts for 4s longer. Additionally, Diluc gains 20% Pyro DMG Bonus during the duration of this effect.

passiveTalents.title: Tradition of the Dawn Knight
passiveTalents.description: Refunds 15% of the ore used when crafting Claymore-type weapons.

constellations.title: Conviction
constellations.description: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.

constellations.title: Searing Ember
constellations.description:
When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s.
This effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

constellations.title: Fire and Steel
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Searing Onslaught by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Flowing Flame
constellations.description:
Casting Searing Onslaught in rhythm greatly increases damage dealt.
2s after casting Searing Onslaught, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for 2s.

constellations.title: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Dawn by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.title: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of the Dark
constellations.description:
After casting Searing Onslaught, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%.
Additionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.
